require ("Game/Core/UI/LoopScroll/LoopScrollController")

TestVScrollController = Class(LoopScrollController,function(self)
    self.listData = {}
    for i = 1, 150 do
        table.insert(self.listData,"Item"..i)
    end
end)

function TestVScrollController:DoStart()
    self.scrollView.TotalCount = #(self.listData)
end

function TestVScrollController:SetItemData(item,index)
    item:SetItemData(self.listData[index])
end
